thread.title: MP
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by MP

author: MP
title: MP
text:
I am extremely happy I made the decision to see David Sklar. I was a little nervous at first for a lot of different reasons but once everything was said and done my financial life has changed for the better. Rhoda has made my experience with David Sklar worry free and at ease with my decision. This has honestly given me a new beginning. I have been financial stress free.
I have learnt a lot.
